column4: Hi, I'm having a weird problem. When I use the volume keys on my laptop, the OSD for the volume shows up and even slides up and down, but it doesn't actually change the volume. When I click on the volume slider by the clock it always stays the same. Why would this be?
launch alsamixer and adjust your volume with your keyboard and see which mixer it's adjusting the volume for
Oh, its modifying the mic... how strange. How could I change it to use the Master volume instead?
that i'm afraid i'm not sure about. i don't know how to remap the mixers but you could override it by using xbindkeys
you most likely want to control your pcm volume
